name: purveyed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
purvey
to provide goods or services as a business, or to provide information: This company has purveyed clothing to the armed forces for generations. The president's speech was intended to purvey a message of optimism. Synonyms
furnish someone with something formal
provide (SUPPLY)
provision formal
supply
